change.changenote: Section 1 was enacted by 2010-16-1, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 141/2013).
Section 1 (1) definitions of "registered" and "registration" BEFORE replaced by 2012-14-5, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 141/2013).

paragraphtext.green: under a law providing for the registration of a security interest;

change.changenote: Sections 2 to 24 were enacted by 2010-16-2 to 24, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 141/2013).
Section 25 was enacted by 2010-16-25, effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 26 was enacted by 2010-16-26, effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 27 (5) (a) was enacted by 2010-16-27(part), effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 2 7(5) (b) and (c) were enacted by 2010-16-27, effective January 18, 2013 (BC Reg 3/2013).
Section 28 was enacted by 2010-16-28, effective January 18, 2013 (BC Reg 3/2013).
Section 29 (1) (b) was enacted by 2010-16-29, effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 29 (1) (a) and (2) to (5) were enacted by 2010-16-29, effective January 18, 2013 (BC Reg 3/2013).
Section 30 was enacted by 2010-16-30, effective January 18, 2013 (BC Reg 3/2013)
Section 31 was enacted by 2010-16-31, effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 32 was enacted by 2010-16-32, effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 33 was enacted by 2010-16-33, effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 33.1 was enacted by 2012-14-6, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 141/2013).
Section 34 was enacted by 2010-16-34, effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 35 (part) was enacted by 2010-16-35(part), effective March 30, 2012 (BC Reg 64/2012).
Section 35 (3) (f) and (g) were enacted by 2010-16-35, effective January 18, 2013 (BC Reg 3/2013).
Section 35 (2), (3) (a) to (d), (h) and (i) were enacted by 2010-16-35, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 141/2013).
Section 35 (3) (j.1) and (l) were added by 2012-14-7, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 141/2013).
